TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UndistributedEarningsOfDomesticSubsidiar.label: Undistributed Earnings of Domestic Subsidiaries
UndistributedEarningsOfDomesticSubsidiar.description: Amount of undistributed earnings of domestic subsidiaries or domestic joint ventures intended to be permanent.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

AllowanceForNotesAndLoansReceivableCurre.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AllowanceForNotesAndLoansReceivableCurre.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable, classified as current.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightNumberOfSecuritiesC.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Number of Securities Called by Warrants or Rights
ClassOfWarrantOrRightNumberOfSecuritiesC.description: Number of securities into which the class of warrant or right may be converted. For example, but not limited to, 500,000 warrants may be converted into 1,000,000 shares.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Outstanding
ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.description: Number of warrants or rights outstanding.

DepreciationAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
DepreciationAndAmortization.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFore.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFore.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to statutory income tax expense (benefit) outside of the country of domicile.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncreaseDecreaseInInventories.label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories
IncreaseDecreaseInInventories.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of all inventory held by the reporting entity, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

InterestPayableCurrent.label: Interest Payable, Current
InterestPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of [accrued] interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred and is unpaid. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

InventoryNet.label: Inventory, Net
InventoryNet.description: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

InventoryValuationReserves.label: Inventory Valuation Reserves
InventoryValuationReserves.description: Amount of valuation reserve for inventory.

MinorityInterest.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
MinorityInterest.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (that is, noncontrolling interest, previously referred to as minority interest).

NotesAndLoansReceivableGrossCurrent.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
NotesAndLoansReceivableGrossCurrent.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as current.

ProceedsFromLoanOriginations1.label: Proceeds from Loan Originations
ProceedsFromLoanOriginations1.description: Cash inflow associated with loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property) or lease origination.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeited in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that were forfeited during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Forfeitures, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average fair value as of the grant date of equity-based award plans other than stock (unit) option plans that were not exercised or put into effect as a result of the occurrence of a terminating event.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average fair value at grant date for nonvested equity-based awards issued during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of non-vested equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that validly exist and are outstanding as of the balance sheet date.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Per share or unit weighted-average fair value of nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes share and unit options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average fair value as of grant date pertaining to an equity-based award plan other than a stock (or unit) option plan for which the grantee gained the right during the reporting period, by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash in accordance with the terms of the arrangement.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.label: Payments for Capital Improvements
PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of or capital improvements to properties held for investment (operating, managed, leased) or for use.

PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.label: Payments to Acquire Machinery and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of machinery and equipment.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Gross
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Aggregate value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period.

AccountsReceivableNet.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

AccruedInvestmentIncomeReceivable.label: Accrued Investment Income Receivable
AccruedInvestmentIncomeReceivable.description: Interest, dividends, rents, ancillary and other revenues earned but not yet received by the entity on its investments.

AccruedPayrollTaxesCurrent.label: Accrued Payroll Taxes, Current
AccruedPayrollTaxesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory payroll taxes incurred through that date and withheld from employees pertaining to services received from them, including entity's matching share of the employees FICA taxes and contributions to the state and federal unemployment insurance programs. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AdjustmentsNoncashItemsToReconcileNetInc.label: Adjustments, Noncash Items, to Reconcile Net Income (Loss) to Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
AdjustmentsNoncashItemsToReconcileNetInc.description: The aggregate amount of adjustments to net income or loss necessary to remove the effects of all items whose cash effects are investing or financing cash flows. The aggregate amount also includes all noncash expenses and income items which reduce or increase net income and are thus added back or deducted when calculating cash provided by or used in operating activities.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current, Other
AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.description: Amount of other assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Exercise Price of Warrants or Rights
ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.description: Exercise price per share or per unit of warrants or rights outstanding.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightNumberOfSecuritiesC.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Number of Securities Called by Each Warrant or Right
ClassOfWarrantOrRightNumberOfSecuritiesC.description: Number of securities into which each warrant or right may be converted. For example, but not limited to, each warrant may be converted into two shares.

DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.description: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateDuringPeriod.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate During Period
DebtInstrumentInterestRateDuringPeriod.description: The average effective interest rate during the reporting period.

DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentPrincipal.label: Debt Instrument, Periodic Payment, Principal
DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentPrincipal.description: Amount of the required periodic payments applied to principal.

DerivativeAverageExchangeRateFloor1.label: Derivative, Average Exchange Rate Floor
DerivativeAverageExchangeRateFloor1.description: Average floor rate on a group of foreign currency derivatives for example, but not limited to, floors or collars.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Accounts, Notes and Loans Receivable, Net
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as accounts, notes and loans receivable attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as accounts payable and accrued liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Cash and Cash Equivalents
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as cash and cash equivalents attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Consideration
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of consideration received or receivable for the disposal of assets and liabilities, including discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Liabilities
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as other liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Prepaid and Other Assets, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as prepaid and other assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Property, Plant and Equipment, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as property, plant and equipment attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Unpaid Principal Balance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without related allowance for credit losses.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts and Other Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from customers for the credit sale of goods and services; includes accounts receivable and other types of receivables.

InterestAndOtherIncome.label: Interest and Other Income
InterestAndOtherIncome.description: The amount of interest income and other income recognized during the period. Included in this element is interest derived from investments in debt securities, cash and cash equivalents, and other investments which reflect the time value of money or transactions in which the payments are for the use or forbearance of money and other income from ancillary business-related activities (that is, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InventoryFinishedGoods.label: Inventory, Finished Goods, Gross
InventoryFinishedGoods.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of completed merchandise or goods expected to be sold within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

InvestmentOwnedBalancePrincipalAmount.label: Investment Owned, Balance, Principal Amount
InvestmentOwnedBalancePrincipalAmount.description: For investments which are quantified by principal amount, the principle balance held at close of period.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

NetInvestmentInLease.label: Net Investment in Lease
NetInvestmentInLease.description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing lease.

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Subsidiary Equity Issuance
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.

OtherAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitie.label: Other Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
OtherAccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitie.description: Amount of liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received classified as other, and expenses incurred but not yet paid, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherReceivablesGrossCurrent.label: Other Receivables, Gross, Current
OtherReceivablesGrossCurrent.description: Amount, before allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
PrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsPerc.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Percentage, Year One
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsPerc.description: Percentage of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfDebtMaturingInMo.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfDebtMaturingInMo.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing net of the cash outflow from repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months. Includes long-term debt and short-term debt.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligationPer.label: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Percentage
RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligationPer.description: Percentage of remaining performance obligation to total remaining performance obligation not recognized as revenue.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted-average exercise price, at which grantee can acquire shares reserved for issuance, for fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated.

StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Authorized Amount
StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.description: Amount of stock repurchase plan authorized.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

WarrantExercisePriceDecrease.label: Warrant, Exercise Price, Decrease
WarrantExercisePriceDecrease.description: Per share decrease in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

WarrantExercisePriceIncrease.label: Warrant, Exercise Price, Increase
WarrantExercisePriceIncrease.description: Per share increase in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

AccountsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Accounts Payable
AccountsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

AllowanceForDoubtfulOtherReceivablesCurr.label: Allowance for Doubtful Other Receivables, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulOtherReceivablesCurr.description: Amount of valuation allowance for receivables classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current
AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

CashAndCashEquivalentsFairValueDisclosur.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Fair Value Disclosure
CashAndCashEquivalentsFairValueDisclosur.description: Fair value portion of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

DepositsAssetsCurrent.label: Deposits Assets, Current
DepositsAssetsCurrent.description: Carrying value of amounts transferred to third parties for security purposes that are expected to be returned or applied towards payment within one year or during the operating cycle, if shorter.

FairValueNetAssetLiability.label: Fair Value, Net Asset (Liability)
FairValueNetAssetLiability.description: Fair value of asset after deduction of liability.

ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBefore.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), before Tax
ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBefore.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Domestic
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to domestic operations.

MembersEquity.label: Members' Equity
MembersEquity.description: Amount of ownership interest in limited liability company (LLC), attributable to the parent entity.

MembersEquityAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Members' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
MembersEquityAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of ownership interest in limited liability company (LLC) directly or indirectly attributable to noncontrolling interests.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurre.label: Accrual for Taxes Other than Income Taxes, Current
AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurre.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax credits. Including, but not limited to, research credit, foreign tax credit, investment tax credit, and other tax credits.

ExcessStockSharesIssued.label: Excess Stock, Shares Issued
ExcessStockSharesIssued.description: Number of excess stock shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders.

LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Loans Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of loan receivable, including, but not limited to, mortgage loans held for investment, finance receivables held for investment, policy loans on insurance contracts.

NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAva.label: Net Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAva.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from continuing operations available to common shareholders.

NoncontrollingInterestInVariableInterest.label: Noncontrolling Interest in Variable Interest Entity
NoncontrollingInterestInVariableInterest.description: Portion of equity (net assets) in a variable interest entity (VIE) not attributable, directly or indirectly, to the parent entity. That is, this is the portion of equity in a VIE that is attributable to the noncontrolling interest (previously referred to as minority interest).

ReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Receivables, Net, Current
ReceivablesNetCurrent.description: The total amount due to the entity within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received on Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.description: Cash received on stock transaction after deduction of issuance costs.

SaleOfStockPricePerShare.label: Sale of Stock, Price Per Share
SaleOfStockPricePerShare.description: Per share amount received by subsidiary or equity investee for each share of common stock issued or sold in the stock transaction.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

AccountsPayableCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Current
AccountsPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AssetsNoncurrent.label: Assets, Noncurrent
AssetsNoncurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold or consumed after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilitiesAndO.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities and Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilitiesAndO.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accrued expenses, and obligations classified as other.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

LiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Liabilities, Noncurrent
LiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of obligation due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization Expense
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.description: Amount of amortization expense for right-of-use asset from operating lease.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.

OtherLoansPayableCurrent.label: Other Loans Payable, Current
OtherLoansPayableCurrent.description: Amount of long-term loans classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.label: Other Payments to Acquire Businesses
OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.description: The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Exercised
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of non-option equity instruments exercised by participants.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Granted
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Net number of non-option equity instruments granted to participants.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of equity instruments other than options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested instruments.

AdditionalPaidInCapitalCommonStock.label: Additional Paid in Capital, Common Stock
AdditionalPaidInCapitalCommonStock.description: Value received from shareholders in common stock-related transactions that are in excess of par value or stated value and amounts received from other stock-related transactions. Includes only common stock transactions (excludes preferred stock transactions). May be called contributed capital, capital in excess of par, capital surplus, or paid-in capital.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePe.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AssetImpairmentCharges.label: Asset Impairment Charges
AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration, Asset
BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.description: Amount of asset recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Cash and Equivalents
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, acquired at the acquisition date. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Assets, Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Assets, Receivables
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount due from customers or clients for goods or services, including trade receivables, that have been delivered or sold in the normal course of business, and amounts due from others, including related parties expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Liabilities, Accounts Payable
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of liabilities incurred for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business and related party payables, assumed at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Deferred Tax Liabilities
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences assumed at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired, Goodwill, and Liabilities Assumed, Net
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount recognized for assets, including goodwill, in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed.

CashFDICInsuredAmount.label: Cash, FDIC Insured Amount
CashFDICInsuredAmount.description: The amount of cash deposited in financial institutions as of the balance sheet date that is insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

CostOfRevenue.label: Cost of Revenue
CostOfRevenue.description: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets other than goodwill.

DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDisco.label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation, before Income Tax
DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDisco.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Expense
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of operating expense attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Income (Loss)
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of operating income (loss) attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Revenue
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of revenue attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Other, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxH.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Holiday, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxH.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income exempt from income tax because of a tax holiday.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.description: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.description: Amount before amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.description: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.

GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.label: Goodwill and Intangible Asset Impairment
GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.description: Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillImpairmentLossNetOfTax.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss, Net of Tax
GoodwillImpairmentLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of loss recognized that results from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillTranslationAndPurchaseAccounting.label: Goodwill, Translation and Purchase Accounting Adjustments
GoodwillTranslationAndPurchaseAccounting.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from foreign currency translation adjustments and purchase accounting adjustments of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.description: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsA.label: Net Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsA.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from discontinued operations available to common shareholders.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Current
OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

ReceivableWithImputedInterestEffectiveYi.label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Effective Yield (Interest Rate)
ReceivableWithImputedInterestEffectiveYi.description: Yield on the receivable, on which interest has been imputed, as calculated from its issuance value or purchase price. The calculated effective interest rate considers factors such as the issued face value or price paid for the receivable, the time period between payments, and the time until maturity [full receipt] of the receivable.

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.label: Undistributed Earnings of Foreign Subsidiaries
UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.description: Amount of undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiaries intended to be permanently reinvested outside the country of domicile.
